acupoint.standard_location: 在腕部，腕掌侧横纹尺侧端，尺侧腕屈肌腱的桡侧凹陷处
acupoint.standard_location_en: At the wrist, on the ulnar end of the transverse crease, in the depression on the radial side of the flexor carpi ulnaris tendon
acupoint.simple_method: 手腕横纹小指侧，小指侧大筋（尺侧腕屈肌腱）靠拇指侧的凹陷中
acupoint.simple_method_en: At wrist crease on pinky side, find the big tendon, then feel the depression just toward the thumb side of it.
acupoint.anatomical: 在尺侧腕屈肌腱与指浅屈肌之间；有尺动脉；布有前臂内侧皮神经，尺神经
functions: 宁心安神 (calm heart, tranquilize spirit)
通络止痛 (unblock collaterals, relieve pain)
